shrilanipaya ha ejapaya yanuwen dhanapathi panthiye paksha dekak pawathwa ganime adahasa dhaneshwara kramaya awulak nathiwa pawathwa ganimayi.kramaya susara kota thibenne ek pakshayak atha aandu balaya radawima ha aneth pakshaya wipakshaye thabima matha,aandu balaye sitina pakshaya aprasadayata lakwana wita swayankriyawa aneth dhanapathi pakshaya balayata ena paridiya.rajapakshage pawulwadi rejimaya wisin ese susara kota thibu dhaneshwara kramaye deshapalanaya peramuna ekthara durakata awul kota thibe.(panthimaya awashyathawanta ihalin pawulmaya awashyatha thabima haraha)me nisa lankawe dhanapathi panthiye sampradayikawa balaya hebawu dakshinanshika kotas saha mahindage pawulwadi nawa prabhu kotas athara prathiwirodhayak hatagena atha.me prathiwirodhaya aadhipathyaya sambandhayen prabhu depirisak athara hatagena thibena aarowaki.me aarowedi wamanshikayan gatha yuthu sthawaraya kumakda?ek kandayamak palawa hara jayaganna andama gana anith kandayamata tiyushan laba dimada?ejapaya jayagaththath kirimata niyamitha dhaneshwara sanwardhana wada itha agana lesa me wanawitath uthuru nagenahira idam kunukolleta wikuna damamin,dhiwarayange jiwitha matha si plen bassamin siduwemin thibe.pidithayage parshawaye sita balanawita ejapaya nagittaya kiya athiwana yahapatha kumakda?

prashnaya animisalochana pujawa ketiyen pahadili karanna.pilithura asipiya nohela buddhathwaya awabodha kara ganima sandaha sewana dun bodhin wahanse desa bala sita kalaguna salakimayi.prashnaya parani dambaadiwa rohini nadiyehi jalaya bedaganima pilibanda athiwu arbudaya pilibandawa pahadili karanna.pilithurashakya ,koliya depirisa athara athiwu yuddhayata mulika hethuwa wuye me depirisa athara jalaye urumaya pilibanda prashnayayi.

nawatha warak 1975 di shri lankawa peksmin pasipik aayathanaya samanga ekwa kaweri kotase gaweshana arambaiya. 1976 mannarama saha delf dupathe kanim sidukara gaweshana katayuthu sidu keleya. 1981 di sitis sarwisas aayathanaya kaweri besin saha mannarama awata indhana saha gas sewime uthsahayaka nirathawa mitar 1437 k gambaurata kanim sidu kalaha.
